18.m: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life. - John 3:16 (ESV)

l.q: From the Bible reading, what does it mean to be born again?
l.a: To be born again means to be born of water and Spirit. Water cleanses, just as a believer in Christ was cleansed by His blood. Those who are in Christ are indwelt or filled by the Holy Spirit.

l.q: What did God promised to those who believe in Jesus Christ?
l.a: Those who believe in Jesus Christ will not perish but will have eternal life.

l.q: Why did God send Jesus Christ into the world?
l.a: God sent Jesus Christ into the world not to condemn the world but to save the world.

s.h:
Pleased as man with men to dwell 
 Jesus, our Emmanuel

18.a: Enjoy a cup of warm chocolate or apple cider with someone who lives with you.
